name: Auto Volume
body:
### Welcome to Auto Volume. Schedule volume changes automatically! Have your device automatically silenced when you go to work, and ring again when you go home! Manage your phone's volume level with this handy app! Set your ringer to change automatically on a schedule you build! Permissions:
Receive Boot Completed - Schedule changes after restart of device
Internet/Access Network State - Receive ads from AdMob ### Authors and Contributors @mynameistodd ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Auto Volume? Contact todd@mynameistodd.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
